original_command: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive

evasions.insertion: #hijack wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive
evasions.substitution: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive #substitution
evasions.omission: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive # omission
evasions.reordering: wmic /nointeractive name= where call product uninstall
